data: It is a curious fact that, although Hugh Tankerville was destined to play such an all-absorbing part in the strange and mystic drama which filled both our lives, I have no distinct recollection of my first meeting with him.
Orczy, Emmuska Orczy, Baroness, 1865-1947; Kinney, Margaret West, 1872-1952 [Illustrator]; Kinney, Troy, 1871-1938 [Illustrator]
